The narrative that "it's just Tether" driving #Ethereum adoption is not based in fact.   Tether accounts for 20% or less of Ethereum's gas use.   $ETH's uses are heterogenous & robust; people are just now realizing how oversold it was.

@zackvoell You guys are hitting peak desperation with misleading comments like this.  Ethereum was always meant to upgrade to a Proof of Stake chain, precisely to make the chain more scalable. It will still use ETH.  No one ever said that the PoW chain was infinitely scalable on L1...
